request.description:
+ Allows user to update 1 or more parameter in admin and at the same time maintaing the existing settings in admin


+ Possible parameter values => parameter can either take multiple values or can only accept 1 from the list of possible values.

  
#### Explaining the possible parameter values. 

			Ex: 
			
			"Always -> always" :-
			
			Values to the left of the arrow: 'Always' :- parameter value in admin. THIS IS WHAT THE USER ENTERS IN POSTMAN
			Values to the right of the arrow: 'always' :- values in the DB.
 
 
**approveNewMembersUsing** => Approve new members using => is optional. Possible values:

               Decision Algorithm	-> algorithm
               Always           	-> always
               Manual           	-> manual
               
**approveRepeatMembers** => Approve repeat members => is optional. Possible values:
    			        
               Decision Algorithm -> algorithm
               Always             -> always
               Manual             -> manual
               
**blacklistFraudulentCustomersUsing** => Blacklist fraudulent customers using => is optional. Possible values:
   
              Never 			  -> never
              Profiling Server	  -> profiling
    
**showReferralsButtonOnHomescreenForCustomersOn** => Show Referrals button on the home screen for customers on => is optional. Possible values:

               TZ_TIGO					-> TZ_TIGO
               TZ_VODACOM				-> TZ_VODACOM
               KE_AIRTEL				-> KE_AIRTEL
               KE_SAFARICOM 			-> KE_SAFARICOM
               PH_COINS 				-> PH_COINS
               PH_COINS_BANK			-> PH_COINS_BANK
               PH_COINS_PADALA			-> PH_COINS_PADALA
               PH_COINS_PADALA_EXPRESS	-> PH_COINS_PADALA_EXPRESS
               PH_GLOBE 				-> PH_GLOBE
               PH_SMART 				-> PH_SMART
               PH_VMONEY				-> PH_VMONEY
               MX_CONEKTA				-> MX_CONEKTA
               MX_STP					-> MX_STP
   
**performKYCCheckToNewBorrowers** => Perform KYC Check to New Borrowers => is optional. Possible values:

              Disabled -> 0
              Enabled -> tz_tala, mx_tala, ph_coins_oauth, trans_union_ke (Select according to country)
    
**coinsOAuthFlag** => Coins OAuth Flag => is optional. One can select more than 1 value. Possible values:

               mno_connected -> mno_connected
               mno_id_verified -> mno_id_verified
               phone_exists -> phone_exists
               phone_active -> phone_active
               person_info_correct -> person_info_correct
    
**automaticallyCreditLatestLoanWhenRewardIsAvailable** => Automatically Credit Latest Loan when Reward is Available => 			   is optional. Possible values:

               Yes -> 1
               No -> 0
    
**sendAllTestSMSTo** => Send all test SMS to => is optional. Possible value:

               Phone number for customer to whom the sms is sent ex: for KE customer : 0758466382
   
**sendAllTestEmailTo** => Send all test Email to => is optional. Possible values:

               Email address for customer to whom the sms is sent ex: test@info.com
   
**telerivetTestPhoneID** => Telerivet test phone ID => is optional. Possible value in the format:

               Ex: PN6c6ca9f19cf168f7
   
**cRBLowBalanceThreshold** => CRB Low balance threshold => is optional. Possible value:

               Ex: 1,000,000
    
**organicAcquisitionSources** => Organic acquisition sources => is optional. Possible values:

               Off -> 0
               On -> 1
   
**paidAcquisitionSources** => Paid acquisition sources => is optional. Possible values:

               Off -> 0
               On -> 1
    
**hoverExperimentUsers** => Hover experiment users (percent) (KE only) => is optional. Possible value:

               0 - 100
    
**sendFrom** => Disbursement Settings (B2C) - Send From => is optional. Possible values:

               B2C => mpesa (for all regions: KE, TZ, PH and TZ)
               Employee => employee

**simulateB2CSuccessResponse** => Disbursement Settings (B2C) - Simulate B2C Success Response => is optional. Possible 			   values:

               Yes -> 1
               No -> 0

**b2CResponseCode** => Disbursement Settings (B2C) - B2C Response Code => is optional. Possible
			   value in the range:

               0 - 100

**asyncB2CResponseCode** => Disbursement Settings (B2C) - Async B2C response code => is optional. Possible value in the 			   range:

               0 - 10
     
**asyncB2CResponseMessage** => Disbursement Settings (B2C) - Async B2C response message => is optional. Possible value:

               Ex of message : 'Disbursement is successful'

**adminIdleSignoutTimeout** => Admin idle sign out timeout (in minutes) => is optional. Possible value in the range:

               1 - 90
               
**enablePaymentAccountValidation** => Enable Payment Account Validation, only for MX, is optional. Possible values:
			   
			   no -> 0
               yes -> 1

**autoGenerateReceiptForMX** => Auto generate receipt, only for MX, is optional.
			   
			   no -> 0
               yes -> 1

**maximumNumberOfFetchReceiptAttemptsForMX** => Maximum number of attempts to fetch receipt from STP before auto 					   generating one, only for MX, is optional. Possible values in the range:
               
               1 - 10

request.description:
+ Allows user to update 1 or more parameter in admin and at the same time maintaing the existing settings in admin


+ Possible parameter values => parameter can either take multiple values or can only accept 1 from the list of possible values.

  
#### Explaining the possible parameter values. 

			Ex: 
			
			"Always -> always" :-
			
			Values to the left of the arrow: 'Always' :- parameter value in admin. THIS IS WHAT THE USER ENTERS IN POSTMAN
			Values to the right of the arrow: 'always' :- values in the DB.
 
 
**approveNewMembersUsing** => Approve new members using => is optional. Possible values:

               Decision Algorithm	-> algorithm
               Always           	-> always
               Manual           	-> manual
               
**approveRepeatMembers** => Approve repeat members => is optional. Possible values:
    			        
               Decision Algorithm -> algorithm
               Always             -> always
               Manual             -> manual
               
**blacklistFraudulentCustomersUsing** => Blacklist fraudulent customers using => is optional. Possible values:
   
              Never 			  -> never
              Profiling Server	  -> profiling
    
**showReferralsButtonOnHomescreenForCustomersOn** => Show Referrals button on the home screen for customers on => is optional. Possible values:

               TZ_TIGO					-> TZ_TIGO
               TZ_VODACOM				-> TZ_VODACOM
               KE_AIRTEL				-> KE_AIRTEL
               KE_SAFARICOM 			-> KE_SAFARICOM
               PH_COINS 				-> PH_COINS
               PH_COINS_BANK			-> PH_COINS_BANK
               PH_COINS_PADALA			-> PH_COINS_PADALA
               PH_COINS_PADALA_EXPRESS	-> PH_COINS_PADALA_EXPRESS
               PH_GLOBE 				-> PH_GLOBE
               PH_SMART 				-> PH_SMART
               PH_VMONEY				-> PH_VMONEY
               MX_CONEKTA				-> MX_CONEKTA
               MX_STP					-> MX_STP
   
**performKYCCheckToNewBorrowers** => Perform KYC Check to New Borrowers => is optional. Possible values:

              Disabled -> 0
              Enabled -> tz_tala, mx_tala, ph_coins_oauth, trans_union_ke (Select according to country)
    
**coinsOAuthFlag** => Coins OAuth Flag => is optional. One can select more than 1 value. Possible values:

               mno_connected -> mno_connected
               mno_id_verified -> mno_id_verified
               phone_exists -> phone_exists
               phone_active -> phone_active
               person_info_correct -> person_info_correct
    
**automaticallyCreditLatestLoanWhenRewardIsAvailable** => Automatically Credit Latest Loan when Reward is Available => 			   is optional. Possible values:

               Yes -> 1
               No -> 0
    
**sendAllTestSMSTo** => Send all test SMS to => is optional. Possible value:

               Phone number for customer to whom the sms is sent ex: for KE customer : 0758466382
   
**sendAllTestEmailTo** => Send all test Email to => is optional. Possible values:

               Email address for customer to whom the sms is sent ex: test@info.com
   
**telerivetTestPhoneID** => Telerivet test phone ID => is optional. Possible value in the format:

               Ex: PN6c6ca9f19cf168f7
   
**cRBLowBalanceThreshold** => CRB Low balance threshold => is optional. Possible value:

               Ex: 1,000,000
    
**organicAcquisitionSources** => Organic acquisition sources => is optional. Possible values:

               Off -> 0
               On -> 1
   
**paidAcquisitionSources** => Paid acquisition sources => is optional. Possible values:

               Off -> 0
               On -> 1
    
**hoverExperimentUsers** => Hover experiment users (percent) (KE only) => is optional. Possible value:

               0 - 100
    
**sendFrom** => Disbursement Settings (B2C) - Send From => is optional. Possible values:

               B2C => mpesa (for all regions: KE, TZ, PH and TZ)
               Employee => employee

**simulateB2CSuccessResponse** => Disbursement Settings (B2C) - Simulate B2C Success Response => is optional. Possible 			   values:

               Yes -> 1
               No -> 0

**b2CResponseCode** => Disbursement Settings (B2C) - B2C Response Code => is optional. Possible
			   value in the range:

               0 - 100

**asyncB2CResponseCode** => Disbursement Settings (B2C) - Async B2C response code => is optional. Possible value in the 			   range:

               0 - 10
     
**asyncB2CResponseMessage** => Disbursement Settings (B2C) - Async B2C response message => is optional. Possible value:

               Ex of message : 'Disbursement is successful'

**adminIdleSignoutTimeout** => Admin idle sign out timeout (in minutes) => is optional. Possible value in the range:

               1 - 90
               
**enablePaymentAccountValidation** => Enable Payment Account Validation, only for MX, is optional. Possible values:
			   
			   no -> 0
               yes -> 1

**autoGenerateReceiptForMX** => Auto generate receipt, only for MX, is optional.
			   
			   no -> 0
               yes -> 1

**maximumNumberOfFetchReceiptAttemptsForMX** => Maximum number of attempts to fetch receipt from STP before auto 					   generating one, only for MX, is optional. Possible values in the range:
               
               1 - 10

request.description:
+ Allows user to update 1 or more parameter in admin and at the same time maintaing the existing settings in admin


+ Possible parameter values => parameter can either take multiple values or can only accept 1 from the list of possible values.

  
#### Explaining the possible parameter values. 

			Ex: 
			
			"Always -> always" :-
			
			Values to the left of the arrow: 'Always' :- parameter value in admin. THIS IS WHAT THE USER ENTERS IN POSTMAN
			Values to the right of the arrow: 'always' :- values in the DB.
 
 
**approveNewMembersUsing** => Approve new members using => is optional. Possible values:

               Decision Algorithm	-> algorithm
               Always           	-> always
               Manual           	-> manual
               
**approveRepeatMembers** => Approve repeat members => is optional. Possible values:
    			        
               Decision Algorithm -> algorithm
               Always             -> always
               Manual             -> manual
               
**blacklistFraudulentCustomersUsing** => Blacklist fraudulent customers using => is optional. Possible values:
   
              Never 			  -> never
              Profiling Server	  -> profiling
    
**showReferralsButtonOnHomescreenForCustomersOn** => Show Referrals button on the home screen for customers on => is optional. Possible values:

               TZ_TIGO					-> TZ_TIGO
               TZ_VODACOM				-> TZ_VODACOM
               KE_AIRTEL				-> KE_AIRTEL
               KE_SAFARICOM 			-> KE_SAFARICOM
               PH_COINS 				-> PH_COINS
               PH_COINS_BANK			-> PH_COINS_BANK
               PH_COINS_PADALA			-> PH_COINS_PADALA
               PH_COINS_PADALA_EXPRESS	-> PH_COINS_PADALA_EXPRESS
               PH_GLOBE 				-> PH_GLOBE
               PH_SMART 				-> PH_SMART
               PH_VMONEY				-> PH_VMONEY
               MX_CONEKTA				-> MX_CONEKTA
               MX_STP					-> MX_STP
   
**performKYCCheckToNewBorrowers** => Perform KYC Check to New Borrowers => is optional. Possible values:

              Disabled -> 0
              Enabled -> tz_tala, mx_tala, ph_coins_oauth, trans_union_ke (Select according to country)
    
**coinsOAuthFlag** => Coins OAuth Flag => is optional. One can select more than 1 value. Possible values:

               mno_connected -> mno_connected
               mno_id_verified -> mno_id_verified
               phone_exists -> phone_exists
               phone_active -> phone_active
               person_info_correct -> person_info_correct
    
**automaticallyCreditLatestLoanWhenRewardIsAvailable** => Automatically Credit Latest Loan when Reward is Available => 			   is optional. Possible values:

               Yes -> 1
               No -> 0
    
**sendAllTestSMSTo** => Send all test SMS to => is optional. Possible value:

               Phone number for customer to whom the sms is sent ex: for KE customer : 0758466382
   
**sendAllTestEmailTo** => Send all test Email to => is optional. Possible values:

               Email address for customer to whom the sms is sent ex: test@info.com
   
**telerivetTestPhoneID** => Telerivet test phone ID => is optional. Possible value in the format:

               Ex: PN6c6ca9f19cf168f7
   
**cRBLowBalanceThreshold** => CRB Low balance threshold => is optional. Possible value:

               Ex: 1,000,000
    
**organicAcquisitionSources** => Organic acquisition sources => is optional. Possible values:

               Off -> 0
               On -> 1
   
**paidAcquisitionSources** => Paid acquisition sources => is optional. Possible values:

               Off -> 0
               On -> 1
    
**hoverExperimentUsers** => Hover experiment users (percent) (KE only) => is optional. Possible value:

               0 - 100
    
**sendFrom** => Disbursement Settings (B2C) - Send From => is optional. Possible values:

               B2C => mpesa (for all regions: KE, TZ, PH and TZ)
               Employee => employee

**simulateB2CSuccessResponse** => Disbursement Settings (B2C) - Simulate B2C Success Response => is optional. Possible 			   values:

               Yes -> 1
               No -> 0

**b2CResponseCode** => Disbursement Settings (B2C) - B2C Response Code => is optional. Possible
			   value in the range:

               0 - 100

**asyncB2CResponseCode** => Disbursement Settings (B2C) - Async B2C response code => is optional. Possible value in the 			   range:

               0 - 10
     
**asyncB2CResponseMessage** => Disbursement Settings (B2C) - Async B2C response message => is optional. Possible value:

               Ex of message : 'Disbursement is successful'

**adminIdleSignoutTimeout** => Admin idle sign out timeout (in minutes) => is optional. Possible value in the range:

               1 - 90
               
**enablePaymentAccountValidation** => Enable Payment Account Validation, only for MX, is optional. Possible values:
			   
			   no -> 0
               yes -> 1

**autoGenerateReceiptForMX** => Auto generate receipt, only for MX, is optional.
			   
			   no -> 0
               yes -> 1

**maximumNumberOfFetchReceiptAttemptsForMX** => Maximum number of attempts to fetch receipt from STP before auto 					   generating one, only for MX, is optional. Possible values in the range:
               
               1 - 10
